children.text: On layer 2 entry: a as in apple
On layer 3 entry: a as in anchor
On layer 4 entry: a as in ant and ant-eater
On Layer 9: Touching object will make read aloud that object name

events.title: Layout 2 .Layer 10: Game to identify the objects starting with sound 'a'

children.text: On click of success, play 'tring', star awards and also refresh the page for next set of objects to play ;   The objectSerial for 'a' TRUE objects are RESERVED from 41-60; THE FALSE objects of 'a' are RESERVED from 61-80
On click of wrong objects, play 'bloop'
Entry and exit control of true and false objects
Layer 10: play 's' sound after instruction(instruction is given in the function call displayObjecton Screen())

actions.text: If togglePosition is 'true', swap Position1 >> Position 3
If togglePosition is 'false', swap Position2 >> Position 3
